speaker: President. –
english: President. – The next item is the report by Inés Ayala Sender, on behalf of the Committee on Transport and Tourism, on freight transport logistics in Europe – the key to sustainable mobility ( 2006/2228(INI) ) ( A6-0286/2007 ).
